com.risk.team.strategy

Class PlayerBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.strategy.PlayerBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, Random

    public abstract class PlayerBehavior
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    PlayerBehavior class contains methods for the Player Behavior. There are five player behaviours i.e. Human, aggressive, benevolent, random and cheater
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    yashgolwala, Harsh Mehta
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • fortificationPhase

        public abstract boolean fortificationPhase(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> selectedCountry,
                                           javafx.scene.control.ListView<Country> adjCountry,
                                           Player playerPlaying)
        Method for fortification phase. Start and end of the fortification phase.
        Parameters:
        selectedCountry - List of countries selected by the player.
        adjCountry - List of adjacent countries.
        playerPlaying - Current player.
        Returns:
        true If the fortification successful; other wise false.
